tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE Intellectual_Property (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    name VARCHAR(255),
    author VARCHAR(255),
    usage_description TEXT,
    royalty DECIMAL(10, 2),
    permission_required BOOLEAN,
    license_expiry DATE
);

CREATE TABLE intellectual_property_usage (
    id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    asset_name VARCHAR(255),
    owner_id UUID,
    royalty_amount DECIMAL,
    usage_start_date DATE,
    usage_end_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE licensing_permission (
    id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    asset_id UUID,
    licensee_id UUID,
    permission_type VARCHAR(255),
    permission_start_date DATE,
    permission_end_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE IntellectualProperty (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    property_name VARCHAR(50),
    owner_name VARCHAR(50),
    creation_date DATE,
    license_type VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE Royalties (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    property_id INT,
    amount DECIMAL(10,2),
    royalty_date DATE,
    payment_status VARCHAR(20)
);

CREATE TABLE Permissions (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    property_id INT,
    licensee_name VARCHAR(50),
    permission_type VARCHAR(50),
    start_date DATE,
    end_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE intellectual_property ( 
    id INT PRIMARY KEY, 
    name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, 
    creator VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, 
    creation_date DATE NOT NULL, 
    royalties DECIMAL(10, 2) NOT NULL 
);

CREATE TABLE licensing (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY, 
    intellectual_property_id INT NOT NULL, 
    licensee VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, 
    license_start_date DATE NOT NULL, 
    license_end_date DATE NOT NULL, 
    license_fee DECIMAL(10, 2) NOT NULL 
);

CREATE TABLE permissions (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY, 
    intellectual_property_id INT NOT NULL, 
    permission_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, 
    issuer VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, 
    expiration_date DATE NOT NULL 
);
